description: four figures sit on steps at entrance to store; one figure in store in background; plethora of objects crowded at each side of figures including: colorful packages, llama and other animal pelts and dries corpses and skeletons, stoneware, herbs, flowers and bottles; sign above reads \"CHIFLERIA MARGARITA\"; framed behind Plexiglas in blonde wood frame
title: Mercado de la Brujas (witches' market), La Paz, Bolivia
